title: Privacy and Recordings - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/20/18
itunes:title: Privacy and Recordings - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/20/18
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and internet expert Lauren Weinstein examine the increased amount of recording of politicians, police officers and college professors, and whether people need to change their behavior to protect their privacy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
